column1: Varin was a Dwarves created for Sierra Entertainments The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring. He was voiced by Steven Jay Blum.
Varin was sent out by Gandalf to provide "the novice" (the player) with a tutorial for the game. Much to his chagrin
column4: to do so.The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring
column5: Tutorial 1 The two squabble back and forth to teach the player basic skills
column6: while Varin outlines basic controls Belenthrond explains the finer details. Varin explains the novice about moving the camera

column11: Tutorial 3 Varin has an hatred for Elves  and Goblins and loves war.
